data

Class AdminPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.AdminPanel

  • public class AdminPanel
extends java.lang.Object
    AdminPanel class represents the administrator of the game, and will have the ability to add users and contestants (until the game begins), as well as handling the bonus questions.
    Author:
    Graem Littleton, Justin McDonald, Jonathan Demelo, Kevin Brightwell, Ramesh Raj

      • AdminPanel

        public AdminPanel()
        Constructor for the AdminPanel class. Fetches a new GameData object and prepares the ArrayLists that will be put to use.

      • getUser

        public User getUser(java.lang.String uniqueId)
        getUser returns a User object based off of an entered unique ID.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        target user

      • addContestant

        public void addContestant(Contestant cont)
        addContestant adds a contestant to the array stored in GameData. Cannot be used if the game has begun.
        Parameters:
        cont - contestant to be added

      • addBonusQuestion

        public void addBonusQuestion(java.lang.String bonus)
        addBonusQuestion adds a bonus question the list of bonus questions. Question cannot be more than 200 characters in length.
        Parameters:
        bonus - bonus question to be added

      • addUser

        public void addUser(User user)
        addUser adds a user to the array list storing the complete list of people playing Survivor Pool.
        Parameters:
        user - user to be added

        public void setGame()

      • removeBonusQuestion

        public void removeBonusQuestion(BonusQuestion target)
        removeBonusQuestion removes a specified bonus question from the array list.
        Parameters:
        target - desired bonus question
